body.value: Experience in programming languages JS, specifically ECMA2017, Typescript, Node.js, Vue.js, Koa.js. Also experienced CSS3/HTML5 coder. Soft skills as PHP, Mysql, MongoDB, React.js, CMS WordPress.

During a rapid development of technologies I’m staying tuned with the latest stack, and implementing them in my study project or production. This means if the tools are not required to my current dev stack, I’m open to learn and use them nowadays. Like React.js or Angular. Or any other tools.
Ability​ ​to work alongside other people, organize time and team. Planning current workflow with Agile software development.
Ability to do my job at a high level standard and company requirements. Use a tools to check my code style and write E2E tests.

10+ years as Frontend and Fullstack developer. Built websites from simple to high level of complexity. The count of them is hundreds. Also I built a Product software from scratch, which uses a +5k users around the world.'

body.value: As a CSS/HTML/JS developer, I specialized in creating dynamic websites tailored for Real Estate agencies. Proficiently translating PSD designs into HTML, I seamlessly integrate them into backend CMS and frameworks. My expertise extends to working with CMS platforms like MODX and WordPress, as well as frameworks including Kohana, Zend, and Symfony. I am also well-versed in template languages like Twig and Smarty.
http://fasteignir.visir.is/ Real Estate Marketplace in Iceland.
Developed UI components for a substantial application utilizing Ext.js, tailored for a Medical Health service. Collaborated with teams spanning the globe.

title: EXPERIENCE

body.value: As a co-founder and author on the Themeforest Marketplace, I held the position of creating highly customizable, flexible, and contemporary templates and themes for a global user base. My primary focus encompassed the design, development, and meticulous testing of UX/UI components.

Realtyspace - Real estate WordPress Theme 
 Contributed to the creation of a top-rated and best-selling Real Estate WordPress theme, earning accolades within its category. My role encompassed crafting all frontend interfaces with an emphasis on extensive customization options and diverse variations. I undertook CSS/HTML/JS coding and seamless integration within the WordPress environment.

Ferienchecker.at - Events Portal Engaged in full stack development of an application utilizing NUXT.js and Node.js, with the Koa framework as the backbone. Encompassing a comprehensive suite of features, the application included membership user capabilities for listing publication, seamless integration of PayPal and SMS payments, email notifications, and the generation of PDF invoices.

skills: BEM, Sass, Gulp, Twitter Bootstrap, full responsive, PixelPerfect, Google API’s, Smarty, Trellis, Ansible, VagrantUp
